text: “Nganimbecheta kukwao ikaŵeje yamwanamwile yanti: ‘Mun'galagatileje Allah, M’mbuje gwangu soni M'mbuje gwenu.’ Soni naliji mboni pa ŵanganyao pa ndema janalonjele chilikati chao. Nambo katema kamwanjigele, Mmwejo ni ŵamwaliji ŵakwalolela ŵanganyao, soni Mmwe pa chindu chilichose m'bele Mboni.”
